subject: Demonstrations, Protests, and Riots
Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: Win or lose, Vancouver is hoping Wednesday’s Game 7 of the Stanley Cup finals doesn’t spark a riotous night like the one that followed the Canucks’ loss to the Rangers in 1994.
snippet: Win or lose, Vancouver is hoping Wednesday’s Game 7 of the Stanley Cup finals doesn’t spark a riotous night like the one that followed the Canucks’ loss to the Rangers in 1994.
